sqlMap.insert: insert into web_todo_works (work_no, work_user_id, work_content, work_todo_no) values (WEB_WORKS_SEQ.nextval, #userId#, #content#, #todoNo#)
sqlMap.select: select W.work_no as no, W.work_user_id as userId, U.user_name as userName, W.work_content as content, W.work_created_date as createdDate from web_todo_works W, web_users U where W.work_user_id = U.user_id and W.work_todo_no = #value# order by w.work_no asc
